sentences.en: A young man of his years needed to have a separate room.
sentences.cn: 他那个年纪的年轻人需要有个单独的房间。

sentences.en: Business bank accounts were kept separate from personal ones.
sentences.cn: 银行的商业账户和个人账户是分开管理的。

sentences.en: Ed stepped in to separate the two dogs.
sentences.cn: 埃德上前把这两条狗分开。

sentences.en: First, separate the eggs (= divide the white part from the yellow part ) .
sentences.cn: 第一步，把蛋清和蛋黄分开。

sentences.en: I've always kept my private and professional life separate.
sentences.cn: 我总是将私生活和工作分开。

sentences.en: If prepared many hours ahead, the mixture may separate out.
sentences.cn: 如果提前几个小时就准备好了，混合物可能会分离开。

sentences.en: In a separate bowl, whisk together the remaining sugar and the yolks.
sentences.cn: 用另外一只碗把剩下的糖和蛋黄搅打均匀。

sentences.en: It isn't always easy to separate the wheat from the chaff.
sentences.cn: 分清良莠并不总是很容易。

sentences.en: Kelly had scored an average of 147 on three separate IQ tests.
sentences.cn: 凯利在3项不同的智商测试中平均得分147。

sentences.en: Let's separate into smaller groups.
sentences.cn: 我们分成几个小组吧。

sentences.en: My wife and I have separate bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 我和妻子有各自的银行账户。

sentences.en: The ability to separate out reusable elements from other waste is crucial.
sentences.cn: 能从其他废料中分离出可重复利用成分是很关键的。

sentences.en: The authorities say six civilians have been killed in two separate attacks.
sentences.cn: 当局声称在两次不相关的袭击中已有6名平民丧生。

sentences.en: The gym and the sauna are in separate buildings.
sentences.cn: 健身房和桑拿浴室在不同的大楼里。

sentences.en: The police wanted to separate them into smaller groups.
sentences.cn: 警察想把他们拆散成几小股。

sentences.en: The schools were adjacent but there were separate doors.
sentences.cn: 这些学校紧挨着，但各自独门独户。

sentences.en: This will keep your dressing from separating.
sentences.cn: 这样可以防止调味汁分层。

sentences.en: This will keep your dressing from separating. ＃
sentences.cn: 这样可以防止调味汁分层。

sentences.en: Transfer this sauce to a separate saucepan, if desired.
sentences.cn: 如果愿意的话，可以把这些调味汁倒入一只单独的长柄锅里。

sentences.en: Truscott's verbosity made it hard to separate plain fact from decorative embellishment.
sentences.cn: 特拉斯科特说话啰唆，让人很难分清哪是纯粹的事实哪是添油加醋的修饰之辞。

sentences.en: Use separate chopping boards for raw meats, cooked meats, vegetables and salads.
sentences.cn: 切生肉、熟肉、蔬菜和拌色拉的青菜时要使用不同的切菜板。

sentences.en: Use separate knives for raw and cooked meat.
sentences.cn: 切生肉和熟肉要用不同的刀。

words.tran_cn: 分开的；分居；不在一起生活的
分离性的；倾向分离的；区别性的
分离，分开；间隔，距离；[法] 分居；缺口
分开；隔开（separate的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 分别敷用；分离上胶；分别申请
独立法人；独立法定单位实体
私有财产；单独支配的财产

phrases.phrase: separate the men from the boys
separate the sheep from the goats
separate the wheat from the chaff

trans.tran_cn: 独立的，分开的，不同的，不相关的
（使）分开，分离，分割，划分，相隔，隔开，分居，区分，分别
trans.tran_en: to divide or split into different parts, or to make something do this
to divide or split into different parts, or to make something do this
to recognize that one thing or idea is different from another
